file_content.text:
Aid the Empire by completing Operation: Explosive Conflict in any difficulty mode.
[Operation: Explosive Conflict] Defeat Warlord Kephess (Any Difficulty Mode).

Aid the Empire by completing Operation: The Eternity Vault in any difficulty mode.
[Operation: The Eternity Vault] Defeat Soa, the Infernal One (Any Difficulty Mode).

Aid the Empire by completing Operation: Karagga's Palace in any difficulty mode.
[Operation: Karagga's Palace] Defeat Karagga the Unyielding (Any Difficulty Mode).

Aid the Empire by completing Operation: Terror From Beyond in any difficulty mode.
[Operation: Terror From Beyond] Defeat The Terror from Beyond (Any Difficulty Mode)

Aid the Empire by completing Operation: Scum and Villainy in any difficulty mode.
[Operation: Scum and Villainy] Defeat Dread Master Styrak (Any Difficulty Mode)

MISSION ASSISTANCE--BY ORDER OF IMPERIAL COMMAND--MESSAGE READS:
Renegade mercenaries have claimed a substantial Isotope-5 cache in the courtyard of Toborro's palace. Their primary defense is a massive droid powered by the substance; this particular model is substantially more dangerous than others our forces have encountered.
We will have that cache. Destroy the droid and clear the way for our retrieval teams.
For the Empire.
END MESSAGE
[Operation: Toborro's Courtyard] Defeat Golden Fury (Any Difficulty Mode).

Aid the Empire by defeating dangerous, high-priority targets on planets across the Galaxy. Surviving an encounter with these enemies will require a large, coordinated Operations group.
Defeat three Heroic World Bosses:
Target List ----------------------- Trapjaw (Tatooine, Level 30) R4-GL (Nar Shaddaa, Level 32) Ulgo Siegebreaker (Alderaan, Level 35) Rogue Cartel Warbot (Quesh, Level 38) Snowblind (Hoth, Level 44) Primal Destroyer (Belsavis, Level 44) Gargath (Hoth, Level 49) Nightmare Pilgrim (Voss, Level 50) Dreadtooth (Section X, Level 50)

Aid the Empire by completing Operation: The Dread Palace in any difficulty mode.
[Operation: The Dread Palace] Defeat The Dread Masters (Any Difficulty Mode).

Aid the Empire by completing Operation: The Dread Fortress in any difficulty mode.
[Operation: The Dread Fortress] Defeat Dread Master Brontes (Any Difficulty Mode).

Aid the Empire by defeating the following enemies in any difficulty mode.
[Operation: The Ravagers] Defeat Captain Coratanni (Any Difficulty Mode).

Aid the Empire by defeating the following enemies in any difficulty mode.
[Operation: Temple of Sacrifice] Defeat Revan (Any Difficulty Mode)

Aid in diminishing the former Sith Emperor's power by defeating the following enemies in any difficulty mode:
[Operation: Heart of Ruin] Defeat the Colossal Monolith (Any Difficulty Mode)
Defeat the Worldbreaker Monolith

Aid in the suppression of emerging threats on Iokath by completing Operation: Gods from the Machine in any difficulty mode.
[Operation: Gods from the Machine] Defeat IZAX, The Destroyer (Any Difficulty Mode).
